text.section: Within 10 days after the Mediation Service issues a report on a challenged ballot or objection under § 4-214 of this subtitle, a party to the consent election may make an exception to the report.

Each party who makes an exception shall:
submit to the Mediation Service:
4 copies of the exception; and
proof of service under item (2) of this subsection; and
serve immediately a copy of the exception on each other party.
